languages.text: "Один из предателей Империума? Едва ли он сам дотронулся до твоего разума — я был бы не в силах совладать с псайкером из числа этих чудовищ. Возможно, он принудил кого-то из смертных служить себе. Быть может, через этого же несчастного он и почувствовал гибель своих приспешников". {n}Дознаватель отводит взгляд и хмурится.{/n} "Какая неописуемая мощь... дотянуться до твоего сознания на таком расстоянии..."

traits.locale_text: "Один из предателей Империума? Едва ли он сам дотронулся до твоего разума — я был бы не в силах совладать с псайкером из числа этих чудовищ. Возможно, он принудил кого-то из смертных коснуться тебя".

languages.text: "One of the traitors to the Imperium? I don't think it was he who touched your mind — I wouldn't have had the strength to go up against a psyker from the ranks of those monsters. He might have forced some mortal to do his bidding. Perhaps it was through the same hapless medium that he sensed the deaths of his henchmen." {n}Heinrix looks away and frowns.{/n} "Such indescribable power... to have reached out to your mind at such a distance..."
languages.original_text: "Один из предателей Империума? Едва ли он сам дотронулся до твоего разума — я был бы не в силах совладать с псайкером из числа этих чудовищ. Возможно, он принудил кого-то из смертных служить себе. Быть может, через этого же несчастного он и почувствовал гибель своих приспешников". {n}Дознаватель отводит взгляд и хмурится.{/n} "Какая неописуемая мощь... дотянуться до твоего сознания на таком расстоянии..."

traits.locale_text: "One of the traitors to the Imperium? I don't think it was he who grasped your mind — I wouldn't have had the strength to go up against a psyker from the ranks of those monsters. He might have forced some mortal to do his bidding. Perhaps it was through the same hapless medium that he sensed the deaths of his henchmen." {n}Heinrix looks away and frowns.{/n} "Such staggering power... to have reached out to your mind from such a distance..."

He might have forced some mortal to do his bidding. Perhaps it was through the same hapless medium that he sensed the deaths of his henchmen." {n}Heinrix looks away and frowns.{/n} "Such indescribable power... to have reached out to your mind at such a distance..."

languages.text: «¿Uno de los traidores al Imperium? Dudo que fuera él quien ha tocado de su mente. No habría podido hacer frente a uno de los psíquicos que esos monstruos tienen en sus filas. Probablemente haya obligado a un mortal a hacer su voluntad. Posiblemente el mismo médium desdichado por el que ha sentido morir a sus lacayos». {n}Heinrix aparta la mirada y frunce el ceño.{/n} «Menudo poder más abrumador... para haber alcanzado su mente desde semejante distancia...».
languages.original_text: "One of the traitors to the Imperium? I don't think it was he who touched your mind — I wouldn't have had the strength to go up against a psyker from the ranks of those monsters. He might have forced some mortal to do his bidding. Perhaps it was through the same hapless medium that he sensed the deaths of his henchmen." {n}Heinrix looks away and frowns.{/n} "Such indescribable power... to have reached out to your mind at such a distance..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Uno de los traidores al Imperium? Dudo que fuera él quien se ha apoderado de su mente. No habría podido hacer frente a uno de los psíquicos que esos monstruos tienen en sus filas. Probablemente haya obligado a un mortal a hacer su voluntad. Posiblemente el mismo médium desdichado por el que ha sentido morir a sus lacayos». {n}Heinrix aparta la mirada y frunce el ceño.{/n} «Menudo poder más abrumador... para haber alcanzado su mente desde semejante distancia...».

languages.text: 「帝国の裏切り者のひとりだと？誰かと勘違いしているのではないでしょうか…あの怪物どもの中にいた異能者に立ち向かう力を、我は持ち合わせていませんでした。奴は人間を従わせたのかもしれません。側近たちの死を察知したのも、同じ不幸な媒体を通してだったのかもしれない」{n}ハインリックスは目をそらし、顔をしかめた。{/n}「これほどの距離であなたの精神に接触できるとは…信じがたい力だ…」
languages.original_text: "One of the traitors to the Imperium? I don't think it was he who touched your mind — I wouldn't have had the strength to go up against a psyker from the ranks of those monsters. He might have forced some mortal to do his bidding. Perhaps it was through the same hapless medium that he sensed the deaths of his henchmen." {n}Heinrix looks away and frowns.{/n} "Such indescribable power... to have reached out to your mind at such a distance..."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の裏切り者のひとりだと？誰かと勘違いしているのではないでしょうか…あの怪物どもの中にいた異能者に立ち向かう力を、我は持ち合わせていませんでした。奴は人間を従わせたのかもしれません。側近たちの死を察知したのも、同じ不幸な媒体を通してだったのかもしれない」{n}ハインリックスは目をそらし、顔をしかめた。{/n}「これほどの距離であなたの精神に接触できるとは…信じがたい力だ…」

languages.text: “帝国的叛徒吗？我认为触碰你的思想的人并不是他，因为如果是那群怪物之中的灵能者，恐怕我的力量并不足以应付。或许他强迫某个凡人执行他的命令，又或许他是通过同样邪恶的渠道，感觉到他那些手下已经死了。”{n}海因里希看向别处，眉头紧锁。{/n}“如此难以言喻的力量……竟然能通过这么远的距离触及你的思想……”
languages.original_text: "One of the traitors to the Imperium? I don't think it was he who touched your mind — I wouldn't have had the strength to go up against a psyker from the ranks of those monsters. He might have forced some mortal to do his bidding. Perhaps it was through the same hapless medium that he sensed the deaths of his henchmen." {n}Heinrix looks away and frowns.{/n} "Such indescribable power... to have reached out to your mind at such a distance..."

traits.locale_text: “帝国的叛徒吗？我不认为是他侵入了你的思想，因为如果是那群怪物之中的灵能者，恐怕我的力量并不足以应付。或许他强迫了某个凡人执行他的命令，又或许他是通过同样邪恶的渠道，感觉到他那些手下已经死了。”{n}海因里希看向别处，眉头紧锁。{/n}“如此难以言喻的力量……竟然能通过这么远的距离触及你的思想……”

languages.text: « L'un des traîtres à l'Imperium ? Je ne pense pas que ce soit lui qui ait pris le contrôle de votre esprit, je n'aurais pas eu la force d'affronter un psyker appartenant à ces monstres. Mais il a peut-être contraint un mortel de se plier à sa volonté. Peut-être ce même malheureux médium lui a-t-il permis de remarquer la mort de ses sbires. » {n}Heinrix détourne le regard et fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Une puissance indicible... capable d'atteindre votre esprit à une telle distance... »
languages.original_text: "One of the traitors to the Imperium? I don't think it was he who touched your mind — I wouldn't have had the strength to go up against a psyker from the ranks of those monsters. He might have forced some mortal to do his bidding. Perhaps it was through the same hapless medium that he sensed the deaths of his henchmen." {n}Heinrix looks away and frowns.{/n} "Such indescribable power... to have reached out to your mind at such a distance..."

traits.locale_text: « L'un des traîtres à l'Imperium ? Je ne pense pas que ce soit lui qui ait pris le contrôle de votre esprit, je n'aurais pas eu la force d'affronter un psyker appartenant à ces monstres. Mais il a peut-être contraint un mortel de se plier à sa volonté. Peut-être ce même malheureux médium lui a-t-il permis de remarquer la mort de ses sbires. » {n}Heinrix détourne le regard et fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Une puissance indicible... capable d'atteindre votre esprit à une telle distance... »

languages.text: "Einer der Verräter des Imperiums? Ich glaube nicht, dass er Euren Verstand berührt hat. Ich hätte nicht die Kraft gehabt, gegen einen Psioniker aus den Reihen dieser Monster zu bestehen. Vielleicht hat er einen Sterblichen gezwungen, ihm zu gehorchen. Vielleicht hat er durch dasselbe ahnungslose Medium den Tod seiner Schergen gespürt." {n}Heinrix wendet sich ab und runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Eine so unbeschreibliche Macht ... aus einer solchen Entfernung in Euren Verstand einzudringen ..."
languages.original_text: "One of the traitors to the Imperium? I don't think it was he who touched your mind — I wouldn't have had the strength to go up against a psyker from the ranks of those monsters. He might have forced some mortal to do his bidding. Perhaps it was through the same hapless medium that he sensed the deaths of his henchmen." {n}Heinrix looks away and frowns.{/n} "Such indescribable power... to have reached out to your mind at such a distance..."

traits.locale_text: "Einer der Verräter des Imperiums? Ich glaube nicht, dass er selbst von Eurem Verstand Besitz ergriffen hat. Ich hätte nicht die Kraft gehabt, gegen einen Psioniker aus den Reihen dieser Monster zu bestehen. Vielleicht hat er einen Sterblichen gezwungen, ihm zu gehorchen. Vielleicht hat er durch dasselbe ahnungslose Medium den Tod seiner Schergen gespürt." {n}Heinrix blickt fort und runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Solch unbeschreibliche Macht ... aus einer solchen Entfernung in Euren Verstand einzudringen ..."

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'a ihanet edenlerden mi? Zihnine dokunanın o olduğunu sanmıyorum. Karşımızdaki ruhsezer öyle bir canavar olsaydı onunla başa çıkacak gücüm olmazdı. Bir fâniye yaptırmış olabilir. Aynı melunun vasıtasıyla uşaklarının ölümünü duymuş olması da muhtemel." {n}Heinrix, bakışlarını çevirip yüzünü asıyor.{/n} "Böyle uzak bir mesafeden zihnine ulaşabilmesi... Bu kudrete akıl sır ermez..."
languages.original_text: "One of the traitors to the Imperium? I don't think it was he who touched your mind — I wouldn't have had the strength to go up against a psyker from the ranks of those monsters. He might have forced some mortal to do his bidding. Perhaps it was through the same hapless medium that he sensed the deaths of his henchmen." {n}Heinrix looks away and frowns.{/n} "Such indescribable power... to have reached out to your mind at such a distance..."

traits.locale_text: “İmparatorluk’a ihanet edenlerden mi? Zihnine dokunanın o olduğunu sanmıyorum. O ruhsezer öylesine bir canavar olsaydı onunla başa çıkacak gücüm olmazdı. Bir fâniye yaptırmış olabilir. Aynı melunun vasıtasıyla uşaklarının ölümünü duymuş olması da muhtemel.” {n}Heinrix, bakışlarını çevirip yüzünü asıyor.{/n} “Böyle uzak bir mesafeden zihnine ulaşabilmek... Bu kudrete akıl sır ermez...”
